Create a mobile app that allows users to track public transportation in real-time and provides personalized recommendations based on their location and schedule.
Implement a bike-sharing program that encourages people to use bikes instead of cars for short trips around the city.
Develop a smart parking system that uses sensors and technology to detect available parking spaces and guide drivers to them.
Implement a pedestrian-friendly redesign of downtown streets to make them safer and more accessible for pedestrians.
Establish partnerships with local businesses to encourage them to offer discounts or incentives to customers who use public transportation.
